Generic CEC is a universal driver provided by Crestron that works with a wide variety of flat panel displays. The specific functionality supported by your device is dependent on the how the CEC specification has been implemented by the device’s manufacturer as the CEC specification does not require device manufacturer to implement the entire command set. For a device specific driver, please visit: https://drivers.crestron.io. For more information please contact Crestron True Blue Support at support@crestron.com

Crestron Connected is a universal driver provided by Crestron that works with a wide variety of flat panel displays and projectors. The specific functionality supported by your device is dependent on what feature set is supported by your device as device manufacturers do not need to implement all parts of the Crestron Connected functionality. For a device specific driver, please visit: https://drivers.crestron.io. For more information please contact Crestron True Blue Support at support@crestron.com
The system has the maximum number of users (5).
Display Name must be at least 1 character long.
Display Name cannot be more than 20 characters long.
Host is required and cannot exceed 40 characters
DN is required and cannot exceed 80 characters
Username is required and cannot exceed 40 characters
Search must contain "%QUERY%" and must start with ( end with ) and cannot exceed 80 characters
The Device Driver(s) have been loaded to the system. Please see the system notification for the driver status.
The Device Driver(s) have failed to load to the system. Please try again. If you have received this message multiple times, please contact Crestron True Blue Support.
Please activate the configuration from the system website to enable the system.

Allowed characters include Alphanumeric, blanks, _ ,-, / and ().
Required value must be (1-20) alphanumeric characters.
Relays are configured in pairs on the selected device.
Required value must be (1-20) alphanumeric characters.
Required value must be (1-20) alphanumeric characters.
The first relay in all the relay pairs will bring the SCREEN UP.
The second relay in all the relay pairs will bring the SCREEN DOWN.
Relay Name cannot be more than 20 characters long.
Device Username cannot be more than 15 characters long.
Device Password cannot be more than 32 characters long.
No Devices support relays. You can add relay from Device Manage Page.

Starting Address is not formatted correctly

Please note, NVXs can use up to three additional multicast addresses depending on the configuration. Please ensure that your configuration does not use the addresses or unexpected behavior can result.
When removing devices such as DM-NVX as a switcher, if the existing DM-NVX configuration is active, all existing DM-NVX devices will be deleted.
Warning: Multicast addresses in this range may conflict with well-known multicast addresses causing unexpected behavior. We recommend setting addresses in the range of 239.130.0.0 or greater.
